verses.verse: וַֽיִּגְּשׁוּ֙ <S%H5066><s%> came near כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all שָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> Then all the captains הַחֲיָלִ֔ים <S%H2428><s%> of the forces וְיֽוֹחָנָן֙ <S%H3110><s%> and Johanan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son קָרֵ֔חַ <S%H7143><s%> of Kareah וִֽיזַנְיָ֖ה <S%H3153><s%> and Jezaniah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son הוֹשַֽׁעְיָ֑ה <S%H1955><s%> of Hoshaiah וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> and all the people מִקָּטֹ֥ן <S%H6996><s%> from the least וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against גָּדֽוֹל׃ <S%H1419><s%> even unto the greatest

וַיֹּאמְר֞וּ <S%H559><s%> And said אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to יִרְמְיָ֣הוּ <S%H3414><s%> unto Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֗יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet תִּפָּל־ <S%H5307><s%> be accepted נָ֤א <S%H4994><s%> Please תְחִנָּתֵ֙נוּ֙ <S%H8467><s%> Let we beseech thee our supplication לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <S%H6440><s%> before וְהִתְפַּלֵּ֤ל <S%H6419><s%> thee and pray בַּעֲדֵ֙נוּ֙ <S%H5704><s%> us אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> for us unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God בְּעַ֖ד <S%H1157><s%> about כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all הַשְּׁאֵרִ֣ית <S%H7611><s%> [even] for all this remnant הַזֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> likewise כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because נִשְׁאַ֤רְנוּ <S%H7604><s%> (for we are left מְעַט֙ <S%H4592><s%> [but] a few מֵֽהַרְבֵּ֔ה <S%H7235><s%> of many כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> your עֵינֶ֖יךָ <S%H5869><s%> as thine eyes רֹא֥וֹת <S%H7200><s%> do behold אֹתָֽנוּ׃ <S%H853><s%>

וְיַגֶּד־ <S%H5046><s%> may shew לָ֙נוּ֙ יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> us the way אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which נֵֽלֶךְ־ <S%H1980><s%> walk בָּ֑הּ וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> and the thing אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which נַעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> that we may do

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H413><s%> then יִרְמְיָ֤הוּ <S%H3414><s%> Then Jeremiah הַנָּבִיא֙ <S%H5030><s%> the prophet שָׁמַ֔עְתִּי <S%H8085><s%> unto them I have heard הִנְנִ֧י <S%H2005><s%> I am going מִתְפַּלֵּ֛ל <S%H6419><s%> [you] behold I will pray אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H430><s%> your God כְּדִבְרֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H1697><s%> according to your words וְֽהָיָ֡ה <S%H1961><s%> become כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole הַדָּבָר֩ <S%H1697><s%> and it shall come to pass [that] whatsoever thing אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יַעֲנֶ֨ה <S%H6030><s%> shall answer יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> אַגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> you I will declare לָכֶ֔ם לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> I will not אֶמְנַ֥ע <S%H4513><s%> back מִכֶּ֖ם <S%H4480><s%> at דָּבָֽר׃ <S%H1697><s%> nothing

וְהֵ֙מָּה֙ <S%H1992><s%> they אָמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> Then they said אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <S%H3414><s%> to Jeremiah יְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> become יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD בָּ֔נוּ לְעֵ֖ד <S%H5707><s%> witness אֱמֶ֣ת <S%H571><s%> be a true וְנֶאֱמָ֑ן <S%H539><s%> and faithful אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if לֹ֡א <S%H3808><s%> not כְּֽכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole הַ֠דָּבָר <S%H1697><s%> not even according to all things אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which יִֽשְׁלָחֲךָ֜ <S%H7971><s%> shall send יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> for the which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God אֵלֵ֖ינוּ <S%H413><s%> about כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> not נַעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> between us if we do

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Whether ט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Whether [it be] good וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> or רָ֔ע <S%H7451><s%> or whether [it be] evil בְּק֣וֹל ׀ <S%H6963><s%> the voice יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> to whom [אֲנוּ כ] (אֲנַ֜חְנוּ <S%H580><s%> we ק) שֹׁלְחִ֥ים <S%H7971><s%> send אֹתְךָ֛ <S%H853><s%> אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> about נִשְׁמָ֑ע <S%H8085><s%> we will obey לְמַ֙עַן֙ <S%H4616><s%> so אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> to whom יִֽיטַב־ <S%H3190><s%> thee that it may be well לָ֔נוּ כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> when נִשְׁמַ֔ע <S%H8085><s%> with us when we obey בְּק֖וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H430><s%> our God ס

וַיְהִ֕י <S%H1961><s%> came מִקֵּ֖ץ <S%H7093><s%> And it came to pass after עֲשֶׂ֣רֶת <S%H6235><s%> ten יָמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> days וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> that the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to יִרְמְיָֽהוּ׃ <S%H3414><s%> came unto Jeremiah

וַיִּקְרָ֗א <S%H7121><s%> Then called אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about יֽוֹחָנָן֙ <S%H3110><s%> he Johanan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son קָרֵ֔חַ <S%H7143><s%> of Kareah וְאֶ֛ל <S%H413><s%> and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all שָׂרֵ֥י <S%H8269><s%> and all the captains הַחֲיָלִ֖ים <S%H2428><s%> of the forces אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after אִתּ֑וֹ <S%H854><s%> for וּלְכָ֨ל־ <S%H3605><s%> and for all הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> which [were] with him and all the people לְמִקָּטֹ֥ן <S%H6996><s%> from the least וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against גָּדֽוֹל׃ <S%H1419><s%> even to the greatest

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And said אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> to כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> unto them Thus saith יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> to whom שְׁלַחְתֶּ֤ם <S%H7971><s%> unto whom ye sent אֹתִי֙ <S%H853><s%> אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> to לְהַפִּ֥יל <S%H5307><s%> me to present תְּחִנַּתְכֶ֖ם <S%H8467><s%> your supplication לְפָנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> before

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If שׁ֤וֹב <S%H7725><s%> If ye will still תֵּֽשְׁבוּ֙ <S%H3427><s%> abide בָּאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in this land הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> I וּבָנִ֤יתִי <S%H1129><s%> then will I build אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and not אֶהֱרֹ֔ס <S%H2040><s%> you and not pull [you] down וְנָטַעְתִּ֥י <S%H5193><s%> and I will plant אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and not אֶתּ֑וֹשׁ <S%H5428><s%> you and not pluck [you] up כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for נִחַ֙מְתִּי֙ <S%H5162><s%> for I repent אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> concerning הָ֣רָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> me of the evil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> i עָשִׂ֖יתִי <S%H6213><s%> that I have done לָכֶֽם׃

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּֽירְא֗וּ <S%H3372><s%> Be not afraid מִפְּנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> of מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king בָּבֶ֔ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom אַתֶּ֥ם <S%H859><s%> ye יְרֵאִ֖ים <S%H3373><s%> ye are afraid מִפָּנָ֑יו <S%H6440><s%> of whom אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּֽירְא֤וּ <S%H3372><s%> be not afraid מִמֶּ֙נּוּ֙ <S%H4480><s%> of him' נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> of him saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אִתְּכֶ֣ם <S%H854><s%> for אָ֔נִי <S%H589><s%> I לְהוֹשִׁ֧יעַ <S%H3467><s%> for I [am] with you to save אֶתְכֶ֛ם <S%H853><s%> וּלְהַצִּ֥יל <S%H5337><s%> you and to deliver אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> מִיָּדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3027><s%> you from his hand

וְאֶתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> And I will shew לָכֶ֛ם רַחֲמִ֖ים <S%H7356><s%> mercies וְרִחַ֣ם <S%H7355><s%> unto you that he may have mercy אֶתְכֶ֑ם <S%H853><s%> וְהֵשִׁ֥יב <S%H7725><s%> upon you and cause you to return אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַדְמַתְכֶֽם׃ <S%H127><s%> to your own land

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if אֹמְרִ֣ים <S%H559><s%> But if ye say אַתֶּ֔ם <S%H859><s%> you לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> We will not נֵשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> We will not dwell בָּאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in this land הַזֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> likewise לְבִלְתִּ֣י <S%H1115><s%> not שְׁמֹ֔עַ <S%H8085><s%> neither obey בְּק֖וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> your God

לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> Saying לֹ֚א <S%H3808><s%> No כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> into the land מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt נָב֔וֹא <S%H935><s%> No but we will go אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> where לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> No נִרְאֶה֙ <S%H7200><s%> where we shall see מִלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> no war וְק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the sound שׁוֹפָ֖ר <S%H7782><s%> of the trumpet לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> No נִשְׁמָ֑ע <S%H8085><s%> nor hear וְלַלֶּ֥חֶם <S%H3899><s%> of bread לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> No נִרְעָ֖ב <S%H7456><s%> nor have hunger וְשָׁ֥ם <S%H8033><s%> there נֵשֵֽׁב׃ <S%H3427><s%> and there will we dwell

וְעַתָּ֕ה <S%H6258><s%> henceforth לָכֵ֛ן <S%H3651><s%> case שִׁמְע֥וּ <S%H8085><s%> And now therefore hear דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <S%H7611><s%> ye remnant יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֩ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֜וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If אַ֠תֶּם <S%H859><s%> you שׂ֣וֹם <S%H7760><s%> If ye wholly תְּשִׂמ֤וּן <S%H7760><s%> set פְּנֵיכֶם֙ <S%H6440><s%> your faces לָבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> to enter מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> into Egypt וּבָאתֶ֖ם <S%H935><s%> and go לָג֥וּר <S%H1481><s%> to sojourn שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> there

וְהָיְתָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> then הַחֶ֗רֶב <S%H2719><s%> Then it shall come to pass [that] the sword אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which אַתֶּם֙ <S%H859><s%> you יְרֵאִ֣ים <S%H3372><s%> are afraid מִמֶּ֔נָּה <S%H4480><s%> at שָׁ֛ם <S%H8033><s%> there תַּשִּׂ֥יג <S%H5381><s%> shall overtake אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> you there in the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וְהָרָעָ֞ב <S%H7458><s%> and the famine אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which אַתֶּ֣ם ׀ <S%H859><s%> you דֹּאֲגִ֣ים <S%H1672><s%> whereof ye were afraid מִמֶּ֗נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> there יִדְבַּ֧ק <S%H1692><s%> shall follow close אַחֲרֵיכֶ֛ם <S%H310><s%> after מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> you there in Egypt וְשָׁ֥ם <S%H8033><s%> there תָּמֻֽתוּ׃ <S%H4191><s%> and there ye shall die

וְיִֽהְי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> will have כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאֲנָשִׁ֗ים <S%H376><s%> the men אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who שָׂ֨מוּ <S%H7760><s%> that set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פְּנֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H6440><s%> their faces לָב֤וֹא <S%H935><s%> to go מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> into Egypt לָג֣וּר <S%H1481><s%> to sojourn שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> there יָמ֕וּתוּ <S%H4191><s%> there they shall die בַּחֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> by the sword בָּרָעָ֣ב <S%H7458><s%> by the famine וּבַדָּ֑בֶר <S%H1698><s%> and by the pestilence וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יִהְיֶ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> will have לָהֶם֙ שָׂרִ֣יד <S%H8300><s%> and none of them shall remain וּפָלִ֔יט <S%H6412><s%> or escape מִפְּנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> from הָֽרָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> the evil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I am מֵבִ֥יא <S%H935><s%> that I will bring עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5921><s%> and ס

כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> For כֹ֨ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֜ר <S%H559><s%> For thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָאוֹת֮ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> the God יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כַּאֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> after נִתַּ֨ךְ <S%H5413><s%> hath been poured forth אַפִּ֜י <S%H639><s%> As mine anger וַחֲמָתִ֗י <S%H2534><s%> and my fury עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on יֹֽשְׁבֵי֙ <S%H3427><s%> upon the inhabitants יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> so תִּתַּ֤ךְ <S%H5413><s%> be poured forth חֲמָתִי֙ <S%H2534><s%> so shall my fury עֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> on בְּבֹאֲכֶ֖ם <S%H935><s%> upon you when ye shall enter מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> into Egypt וִהְיִיתֶ֞ם <S%H1961><s%> will become לְאָלָ֤ה <S%H423><s%> and ye shall be an execration וּלְשַׁמָּה֙ <S%H8047><s%> and an astonishment וְלִקְלָלָ֣ה <S%H7045><s%> and a curse וּלְחֶרְפָּ֔ה <S%H2781><s%> and a reproach וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no תִרְא֣וּ <S%H7200><s%> and ye shall see ע֔וֹד <S%H5750><s%> more אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמָּק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> this place הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

דִּבֶּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> hath said יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD עֲלֵיכֶם֙ <S%H5921><s%> unto שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <S%H7611><s%> concerning you O ye remnant יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תָּבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> Go מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> ye not into Egypt יָדֹ֙עַ֙ <S%H3045><s%> know תֵּֽדְע֔וּ <S%H3045><s%> certainly כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הַעִידֹ֥תִי <S%H5749><s%> that I have admonished בָכֶ֖ם הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> you this day

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for [הִתְעֵתֶים כ] (הִתְעֵיתֶם֮ <S%H8582><s%> go astray ק) בְּנַפְשֽׁוֹתֵיכֶם֒ <S%H5315><s%> in your hearts כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אַתֶּ֞ם <S%H859><s%> who שְׁלַחְתֶּ֣ם <S%H7971><s%> when ye sent אֹתִ֗י <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> me unto the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶם֙ <S%H430><s%> your God לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying הִתְפַּלֵּ֣ל <S%H6419><s%> Pray בַּעֲדֵ֔נוּ <S%H5704><s%> us אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> for us unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God וּכְכֹל֩ <S%H3605><s%> all manner אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after יֹאמַ֜ר <S%H559><s%> shall say יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> and according unto all that the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֛ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> so הַגֶּד־ <S%H5046><s%> so declare לָ֖נוּ וְעָשִֽׂינוּ׃ <S%H6213><s%> unto us and we will do

וָאַגִּ֥ד <S%H5046><s%> declared לָכֶ֖ם הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And [now] I have this day וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> have not שְׁמַעְתֶּ֗ם <S%H8085><s%> [it] to you but ye have not obeyed בְּקוֹל֙ <S%H6963><s%> the voice יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> your God וּלְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all manner אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> he שְׁלָחַ֥נִי <S%H7971><s%> nor any [thing] for the which he hath sent אֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וְעַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> now יָדֹ֣עַ <S%H3045><s%> Now therefore know תֵּֽדְע֔וּ <S%H3045><s%> certainly כִּ֗י <S%H3588><s%> by בַּחֶ֛רֶב <S%H2719><s%> by the sword בָּרָעָ֥ב <S%H7458><s%> by the famine וּבַדֶּ֖בֶר <S%H1698><s%> and by the pestilence תָּמ֑וּתוּ <S%H4191><s%> that ye shall die בַּמָּקוֹם֙ <S%H4725><s%> in the place אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> you חֲפַצְתֶּ֔ם <S%H2654><s%> whither ye desire לָב֖וֹא <S%H935><s%> to go לָג֥וּר <S%H1481><s%> [and] to sojourn שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> in it ס
